name: Outta' Control
description:
That dang HillBilly has gone crazy, he's destroying everything!

You must repair everything he's destroying or you'll have to pay the bill. Try to get the highest score possible!

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Interact - E

that's it

This game was supposed to have 3 levels but I ran out of time due to the fact that I spent 6 hours hardcoding a damn AI that then didn't even work. I then just decided to write it again from scratch, so there goes 6 hours out the window. Rest was spent on the remaining stuff.
